TopicTitle: I took a short break from KSP.

Articles.Content:
Although it was only a relatively short break (starting when 0.25 was released) I've still lost track of what's been happening, as there have been two updates since.

Can someone bring me up to speed?
I presume you don't actually mean 0.25. 0.25 is the current release version.

Although it was only a relatively short break (starting when 0.25 was released) I've still lost track of what's been happening, as there have been two updates since.

Can someone bring me up to speed?

I presume you don't actually mean 0.25. 0.25 is the current release version.

Shh, he's a time traveler!

Well, next update won't be called 0.26, it will be called 0.90.0 as the game will be at Scope Completion once the next release is... Well, released, and we're entering Beta now. 0.90.0 will make an overhaul of the Mk3 parts (The ugly and crappy shuttle parts), and some other stuff.

You can read more here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/313-Beta-Than-Ever-The-Future-of-KSP

Im not sure if you already knew this but its better to be sure

I presume you don't actually mean 0.25. 0.25 is the current release version.

Yeah, sorry. I've been losing track of the version numbers.

What I really meant was 0.24.

Edited October 19, 2014 by SergeantBlueforce

Right. 0.24.2 ... um... what did that update do again? I can't remember

0.25 incorporated SP+, Enhanced Navball as stock, and added destructible buildings.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/0.24

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Version_history#v0.25.0

EDIT:

Oh, right, 0.24 added contracts. *facedesk*

Edited October 19, 2014 by Starwhip
